title: About the website
text: I created this website with Quarto from R and Github, the two major references are:

title: Dewei Lin
text:
Hello! My name is Dewei (duh-way) and I’m currently a Master student in Biostatistics program at UNC Chapel Hill. Before my journey in UNC, I studied Statistics, Economics and Philosophy at University of Toronto, Scarborough Campus, where I spent unforgettable three years.
I’m creating this website just for fun, my plan is to first work on a section “First time ever”, and then add some more interesting contents to my website.

title: First time ever
text:
The Old Well


During my undergraduate, I spent a lot of time exploring myself and I found out my passion during my last year——learning and working with Statistics. We can’t really go back in time, but we have choices every moment from now, that’s why I created this section——to remark the choices that I had never made before.

8/10/2024: YYZ-RDU
First time in North Carolina, weather was not bad and everything went well, it was a good start.



Home Sweet Home




8/11/2024: Built my first PC
Always want to try how it feels like to build a PC on my own, made a several mistakes in between, but eventually made it with help from some friends.





For those curious, here are the details of my build:








Item
Price
Total




PNY GeForce RTX™ 4070 Super 12GB Verto™ OC Dual Fan Graphics Card DLSS 3 (NVIDIA GeForce SFF-Ready, 192-bit, GDDR6X, PCIe 4.0, HDMI/DisplayPort, Supports 4k, incl. Adapter, 2 Slot)
589.99

76



MSI PRO H610M-G DDR4 Motherboard (12th/13th/14th Gen Intel Core, LGA 1700 Socket, DDR4, PCIe 4, SATA 6Gb/s, 1Gbps LAN, M.2 Slots, USB 3.2, mATX)
79



Intel Core i5-12400 Desktop Processor 18M Cache, up to 4.40 GHz
126



CORSAIR 4000D AIRFLOW Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX Case - High-Airflow - Cable Management System - Spacious Interior - Two Included 120 mm Fans - Black
92



Thermalright Assassin X120 Refined SE ARGB CPU Air Cooler, 4 Heat pipes, TL-C12C-S PWM Fan, Aluminium Heatsink Cover, AGHP Technology, for AMD AM4/AM5/Intel LGA 1150/1151/1155/1156/1200/1700 (SE ARGB)
18.90



Western Digital 2TB WD Blue SN580 NVMe Internal Solid State Drive SSD - Gen4 x4 PCIe 16Gb/s, M.2 2280, Up to 4,150 MB/s - WDS200T3B0E
117.39



Corsair RM750e (2023) Fully Modular Low-Noise Power Supply - ATX 3.0 & PCIe 5.0 Compliant - 105°C-Rated Capacitors - 80 Plus Gold Efficiency - Modern Standby Support - Black
99.99
1199.27



*I shall note that I totally don’t recommend the motherboard, it always causes trouble.
